beer.beer_description: Bold yet balanced little hopper strusts in with roasted coffee and dark chocolate malts. Then cheerily flips the script with a lively mix of hops zesty citrus tropical fruit and pine tease their way through the smooth malt backbone finishing crisp and complex

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 130 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black, Schwarzbier, or Mild - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 27!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
